# Example code

```{r, eval=FALSE}
install.packages(c('FLCore'), repos='http://flr-project.org/R')
```

# Example use of data kept in /assets
```{r}
url <- "http://flr-project.org/assets/data/ple4_ca/ple4_ca.csv"

ca <- read.csv(url)
```
